ngiemboon: Sìŋ ndù «‑te» gyɔ́ɔn na ngiembɔɔn tɛʼ.
en: The suffix “‑te” is very common in Ngiemboon.
When are you going to leave?

ngiemboon: Nzsǒ gie à mǎʼ e ne síŋesǐŋ.
en: The clothes he wore are dirty.
Palm oil contains a lot of lipids.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn sisíi nèm gie á tʉ́a.
en: Here, it is the glow of the sun that shines.
